title: Athletism — Rowing (Elite) — Phase 7: Speed Endurance & Lactate Tolerance
goal: Handle acidosis, maintain form under fatigue, protect technique.

warmup: Technical drills: pick drill / pause @ arms-only / legs-only
main: Starts & finishes: 6 sets; last 250m push practice
cooldown: Light stretching (Posterior chain, lats, hip flexors)

notes: Week 1: 8x500m @2k pace, r:2'. Week 2: 10x500m @2k pace, r:2'. Include strict technical cues.
